metadata.title: CVE-2019-13273 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Xymon through 4.3.28, a buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the csvinfo CGI script. The overflow may be exploited by sending a crafted GET request that triggers an sprintf of the srcdb parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-13273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xymon - 4.3.29-1
xymon-client - 4.3.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xymon package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.29-1').
